description.value:
Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation.

You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Opportune Riposte] against an enemy who fails at a Strike against you (not just critically fails), provided you have both damaged that creature with a finisher on your last turn and currently have a circumstance bonus to AC from the parry weapon trait, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)]{Dueling Parry}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Twin Parry].
